The Florida Reef, the world's 3rd largest, lies just off the coast of my district. 

Reefs are home to the highest biodiversity of any ecosystem, but climate change is an existential threat to their survival.

We need #OceanClimateAction.

Let’s protect them and #ActOnClimate.

Maurice was a longtime friend who could charm anyone with his expansive mind and brilliant wit.

It was an honor to know and be counseled by Maurice in life. My thoughts and prayers are with his wife, Mercedes, their children and grandchildren. May he rest in peace. 2/2

Cokie Roberts was a loving wife, mother, and friend. 

She was also a pioneering journalist who helped shatter the glass ceiling in her profession for the generations of women who came after her. 

She will be sorely missed. Rest in Peace, Cokie.
